channel.title: Bgs
channel.description:
So is the item worth it? Cost: 28.7 Million The price has been raising by 200-400k the past week every day.
I'm very tempted too, but I'm worried I will eventually lose money.
I certainly don't want to loose more than 2-2.5 mil on this. And I certainly don't want to wait and watch the price raise.
Anyone have any reviews they'd like to give me? Or if it's worth. Past experiences?
Thanks. [Mainly getting this for god wars]

item.title: Bgs
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Looks good now, but I predict a crash soon.

[quote=“maminerr, post:8, topic:316776”]AGS is overrated
126M for abit more spec that fails half the time anyway
i love my SGS
its so pretty and you look ninja as when speccing :p[/quote]
qft

Read full topic

item.title: Bgs
item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

[quote=“maminerr, post:8, topic:316776”]AGS is overrated
126M for abit more spec that fails half the time anyway
i love my SGS
its so pretty and you look ninja as when speccing :p[/quote]
Yeah, if I only could afford an sgs :{. But I’m looking into the bgs so I hopefully get some drops at god wars and then eventually make my way up.

item.title: Bgs
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

BGS sucks. I bought an AGS for a bit and got rid of it and bought an SGS. I would much rather have at least 5 prayer and 10 hitpoints or more even if you hit a 1, while AGS does it high it can fail easily.

Read full topic

item.title: Bgs
item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:5, topic:316776”][quote author=cows_be_sacred link=topic=413346.msg3044515#msg3044515 date=1259369141]

Im pissed because i spent a month getting 17m and when i finally get to around 16 it jumped up to 25m, i said fuck it and to this day i have not played since and i have 18m sitting in my bank.

You can get a good $30-35 for that if you get lucky.
[/quote]
I could care less about money…[/quote]
Just saying :p.
You could also trade that account for a better one. Since it has 18 mil, and I’m assuming decent stats

Edit: Could I sub it for a sara?

Read full topic

item.title: Bgs
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

all the times i’ve used it, it’s been horrible, the only godswords I liked were saradomin (for slayer tasks), and armadyl (pvp, bandos w6, and just regularly hitting high from special attacks)

in my opinion, i’d just save some extra money, buy better gear, more supplies, etc

Read full topic
